# Scripts

Bundled resources for compliance-checker skill

- [x] compliance_scan.sh: Executes compliance checks using various tools and generates a report.
- [x] report_formatter.py: Formats the compliance report into a user-friendly format (e.g., Markdown, JSON).
- [x] remediation_suggestions.py: Analyzes the compliance report and suggests remediation steps for identified violations.
